question_content.description:
### Problem06

Please select the following choices that are right.

**Choices:**

a. String is a primitive data type in Java.

b. The first letter of the Java identifier can be a digit.

c. In Java, we can use a variable in an expression without declaratiion.

d. A declaration in Java includes a type followed by a variable name.

Excerpt From
Computer Science
Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin
This material may be protected by copyright.
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
choices: a. String is a primitive data type in Java.
b. The first letter of the Java identifier can be a digit.
c. In Java, we can use a variable in an expression without declaratiion.
d. A declaration in Java includes a type followed by a variable name.
